所有软件包的分层结构

软件包分层结构：
applications, core, gui, gui.playfield, input, interfaces, movement, movement.map, report, routing, routing.maxprop, routing.schedule, ui

类分层结构

  • java.lang.Object
    • movement.ActivenessHandler
    • core.Application
      • applications.PingApplication
    • input.BinaryEventsReader (implements input.ExternalEventsReader)
    • movement.BusControlSystem
    • java.awt.Component (implements java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable)

        • javax.swing.JComponent (implements java.io.Serializable)
